hero.title: Unlock Your
hero.subtitle: Master AI and IT fundamentals with our beginner-friendly courses. Start your journey into technology with expert guidance and hands-on learning.

features.title: Why Choose UnlockIT?
features.subtitle: We make complex technology simple and accessible for everyone, regardless of your background.

beginnerFriendly.title: Beginner-Friendly
beginnerFriendly.description: Start from zero with our carefully designed curriculum that breaks down complex concepts into digestible lessons.

handsOn.title: Hands-On Learning
handsOn.description: Build real projects and gain practical experience with interactive coding exercises and real-world applications.

expertSupport.title: Expert Support
expertSupport.description: Get guidance from industry professionals with years of experience in AI, programming, and IT.

courses.title: Popular Courses
courses.subtitle: Start your journey with our most loved courses

aiFundamentals.title: AI Fundamentals

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Build modern websites with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks.

itEssentials.title: IT Essentials
itEssentials.description: Master essential IT skills including networking, security, and system administration.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Tech Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of students who have already transformed their careers with UnlockIT.

footer.description: Empowering beginners to master AI and the necessary knowledge to work in IT through expert-led training and hands-on learning experiences.

enterit.title: EnterIT
enterit.subtitle: Your complete guide to breaking into the IT industry. Learn essential strategies for job searching, interview preparation, networking with recruiters, and leveraging AI for accelerated learning.

whatYoullLearn.title: What You'll Learn
whatYoullLearn.subtitle: Get practical, actionable strategies to kickstart your IT career

jobSearch.title: How to Start Looking for a Job in IT
jobSearch.point1: Identify the best entry-level positions for your background
jobSearch.point2: Create a compelling portfolio even without experience
jobSearch.point3: Navigate job boards and company websites effectively

interview.title: How to Prepare for Interviews
interview.point1: Master common technical and behavioral interview questions
interview.point2: Demonstrate your skills through practical examples
interview.point3: Handle salary negotiations and follow-up communications

recruiters.title: How to Find Recruiters
recruiters.point1: Build a professional network on LinkedIn and other platforms
recruiters.point2: Connect with IT recruiters in your target companies

aiLearning.title: How to Learn with AI
aiLearning.point1: Use AI tools to accelerate your learning process
aiLearning.point2: Get personalized learning paths and practice exercises
aiLearning.point3: Stay updated with the latest technologies and trends

speaker.title: Meet Your Speaker
speaker.subtitle: Learn from an industry expert with proven results
speaker.name: Michał Wroński
speaker.role: Senior IT Career Coach & UnlockIT Founder
speaker.bio: 15+ years of experience in the IT industry - thousands of lines of production code, dozens of projects, and hundreds of interns. Michał will share insider knowledge and proven strategies that work in today's competitive market. As a seasoned professional, he understands the challenges of breaking into IT and will provide practical, actionable advice.
